title: 2016 World Championships Song Theme
body:
Dear Riot member,

As have been for the past 2 years there has been a song to accompany the World Championships for each year, Warriors and Worlds Collide for 2014 and 2015 respectively. When will the 2016 Worlds song be released? If it's anything near Worlds Collide I'm hyped for it. Please make it soon as I love these songs. 

- BurningAvalanche, OCE, Silver 3, Marksman main.

replies.body:
I love them so much as well, and I can't see any reason they wouldn't release one this year. They already have the pre finals song on PBE so I think we can expect something soon :D Of course it may be an instrumental only (as I believe it was pre 2014) but time will tell!

https://youtu.be/gXqbcRWDYPI
